name: DayOfInvasion 1 [2017]
description:
Day of Invasion 1 is a Zombie invasion FPS. 

It was created in GameGuru and was never finished until Today. even thou its really nad, we decided to upload it either, because DayOfInvasion 2 is curently in Production so we thought we cant launch V2 before V1.

So please dont expect too much from it.

BTW sorry for the english, we are from Switzerland
